channel.title: Marthinus J. Du Plessis on
channel.description: Recent content in Marthinus J. Du Plessis on

item.title: The Changing Position of the State and State Power in Global Affairs - Views from Two Scholars in International Political Economy
item.description: Du Plessis, Marthinus J. “The Changing Position of the State and State Power in Global Affairs - Views from Two Scholars in International Political Economy.” South African Journal of Military Studies 28, no. 1 (2012): 146-167. Review of The Retreat of the State (1996) alongside Stephen Krasner, Structural Conflict – The Third World Against Global Liberalism (1985). Keywords: Structural Power, Power; General Framework; Authority vs Markets Text access (external link, Open Access)
